'''24w21b''' is the sixth and final [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.21]], released on May 22, 2024,<ref>{{snap|24w21b|May 22, 2024|id=a}}</ref> which fixes a crash when [[zombie]]s spawn in areas of high [[local difficulty]].
